page.title: 14THE HOWARD ARMS DITTON PRIOR
page.content: The Hotel is approximately{700}years old,it was oringinally two coaching inns.There are four full time workers. {Mrs.J.Marsh}the owner,does the cooking.there are two resedential rooms.The kind of meals they have are {snacks}in the bar{dinners}in the evening in the resturant and{lunch}for up to 30 on Sundays. What they cook varies each day.There are two bathrooms.It is mainly visiters to the area who stay in the Hotel.The hours they work are the hours necessary to give a good service.A maximum of{four} people can stay. They get there{ {supplies}from Bridgnorth and Birmingham market they are mentioned in some{guides}like Michelin, Egon Ronay A.A. Richard Binns etc..The bar has two people working on it.They sell at the bar beer,sweets,cigarettes, alcohol,and snacks.There is a cellar.
